Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, west of Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: The small shopping complex to the north appears to have three buildings along the south end of the block. Directly to the north, you can see Denise's Imported Elven Silks shop. Elven materials are not all that uncommon in Oceancrest as one of the largest trading partners provides services throughout the lands, even deep into elven territory. It's too that the high costs of importing elven material is passed on to the public.
